title: Modern Farmhouse Close to Light Rail, Sloans and Mile High
posting_body: Three bed, two bath 1000sq ft home for rent on 7400 sq ft lot.
Updated kitchen, three ample size bedroom, one full and one brand new 3/4 bath(not pictured), and two living rooms allow your family or group to maintain privacy while sharing a wonderful house.
Amenities include, central air, gas range, dishwasher, washer and dryer.
Brick paver patio with sun shade and string lights opposite a shed round out lot.
Located a quarter mile from the Knox Ct lightrail station, get downtown or to Golden within 10-20 minutes respectively.
Enjoy a beer at Seedstock Brewery blocks to the north and attend Mile High Stadium events within walking distance.
Utilities extra payable to landlord monthly.
Estimated utilities per month depends on usage but will be around $200/mo.
Centurylink already wired but internet responsibility of tenant along with lawn care and snow removal.
Landlord is local and available for issues throughout.
Deposit is one months rent or $5800 to move-in.
$500 per animal deposit with maximum of four on property.
Tenant responsible for neighborly animal behavior.
Showings start 8/8 and will be ready for move-in by 8/22.
